svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17" scale="1" border="20"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="2318" dy="467" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-90" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-120" y="518" width="685" height="242" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-85" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-120" y="290" width="680" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" value="<b>Start</b>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="177.5" y="90" width="90" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-6" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-1" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-1" value="<b>Input Correct Answers (DIP Switch):</b><div>Set the correct answers for each question by configuring the DIP switch accordingly.<br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="288" y="309" width="262" height="71" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-17" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-4" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="419" y="500" /> <mxPoint x="51" y="500" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-4" value="<b>Store Correct Answers in D Flip-Flops:</b><div>Store the DIP switch inputs in the D flip-flops to hold the correct answers.<b><br></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="293.5" y="400" width="251" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-14" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-5" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="349.9999999999999" y="260.0000000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-49" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-5" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-46"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-5" value="<b>Clear Flip-Flop Memory?</b><div><br></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="155" y="160" width="135" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-8" value="
A decision point to determine if memory needs to be cleared before storing new correct answers.

" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="160" width="220" height="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-10" value="<div>No</div><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="200" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-20" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-16" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-18"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-16" value="<b>Scan OMR Sheet (LDR Detection):</b><div>Pass the OMR sheet through the scanning unit, where the LDR and other components will detect the marked answers.<b><br></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-100" y="551" width="301.5" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-54" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-18" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-18" value="<b>Capture Scanned Answer:</b><div>The scanning unit captures the student's answers from the OMR sheet.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-80.38" y="649" width="262.25" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-19" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-22"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-19" value="<b>Increment the Question Counter:</b><div>The question counter is incremented to select the correct question number for processing.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="551" width="261.5" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-81" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-22" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="414" y="730" /> <mxPoint x="414" y="800" /> <mxPoint x="600" y="800" /> <mxPoint x="600" y="130" /> <mxPoint x="905" y="130" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-22" value="<b>Select Correct Answer from Memory (Multiplexer):</b><div>The multiplexer selects the correct answer stored in the flipflops based on the current question number from the counter.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="265" y="649" width="291.5" height="81" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-58" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-24" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-28"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-24" value="<b>Does</b><div><b>&nbsp;Scanned and&nbsp;</b></div><div><b>Correct Answer Match?</b><div><b><br></b></div></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="842" y="160" width="126" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-25" value="The comparator compares the scanned answer<div>&nbsp;with the correct answer selected by the multiplexer.<div><br></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="160" width="292" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-62" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-27" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-32"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="745" y="420" /> <mxPoint x="905" y="420" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-27" value="Increase Correct Answer Count:<div><span style="font-weight: normal;">Increment the count for correct answers and store it for display.</span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="647" y="270" width="195" height="49" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-59" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-28" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-48"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-28" value="<b>Set Incorrect Answer Flag LED on:</b><div>Indicate that an incorrect answer was recorded.<b><br></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="968" y="269" width="210" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-63" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-32" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-66" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-32" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-65"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-32" value="<b>All</b><div><b>&nbsp;Questions&nbsp;</b></div><div><b>Processed?</b><div><b><br></b></div></div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="836.5" y="440" width="137" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-38" value="A decision point to determine if all questions have been scanned and evaluated." style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="938" y="450" width="240" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-80" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-41" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-42"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="872.6923076923076" y="940" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-41" value="Display the Final Score<div>on the 7-segment display&nbsp;</div><div>after processing all questions.</div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="805" y="659" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-42" value="<b>End</b>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="861.5" y="750" width="87" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-52" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-46" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-47"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-46" value="<b>Clear Memory Data:</b><div>Clear the current data stored in the D flip-flops.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-62" y="309" width="210" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-53" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-47" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-47" value="<b>Set LEDs to indicate Memory Cleared:</b><div>After clearing the memory, light up the LEDs&nbsp;</div><div>to indicate that the flip-flops' memory has been&nbsp;</div><div>erased.<br></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="-108.25" y="400" width="302.5" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-61" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-48" target="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-32"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-48" value="<b>Increment Incorrect Answer Counter:</b><div>Increment the counter to track how many incorrect answers there are.</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="958.75" y="350" width="228.5" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-50" value="Yes" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="195" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-55" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="840.9999999999995" y="214.75" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="745.5" y="273.0000000000001" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="746" y="215" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-56" value="Yes" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="763" y="191" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-64" value="No" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="740" y="469" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-71" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-65"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="904.9999999999995" y="660.0000000000005" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-65" value="<b>Calculate the total score:</b><div>Subtract the incorrect answers from the total number of questions to get the final score.&nbsp;</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="778.25" y="571" width="253.5" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-67" value="Yes<div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="900" y="542" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-84" value="No" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="998" y="193" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-89" value="<b>MEMORY UNIT</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="155" y="291" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-92" value="SCANNING UNIT" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="155" y="736" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ClqARLXAvMKOBKxYNiyE-95" value="<b>EVALUATION UNIT</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" with the correct answer selected by the multiplexer.
